textAfterTable: Category D Detail 2011 Local Value 2011 PTD Value Market Value Non-qualified Acres & Farm/Ranch Imp 67,401,997,827 68,291,024,306 Prod Value Qualified Acres 12,903,754,660 13,513,302,339 Taxable Value 80,305,752,487 81,804,326,645 Measures of a School District Wealth Government Code Subsections 403.302 (J) and (K) require the Comptroller to certify alternative measures of school district wealth. These measures are reported for taxable values for Maintenance and Operations (M&O) tax purposes and for Interest and Sinking fund (I&S) tax purposes. For districts that have not entered into value limitation agreements, T1 through T6 will be the same as T7 through T12. Value Taxable for M&O Purposes T1 T2 T3 T4 T5 T6 1,743,256,479,055 1,693,323,798,363 1,725,843,295,728 1,675,910,615,036 1,700,585,137,765 1,683,171,954,438 PVS Deductions Loss to the Additional $10,000 Homestead Exemption 50% of the Loss to the Local Optional Percentage Homestead Exemption 49,932,680,692 17,413,183,327 T1 = School district taxable value for M&O purposes before the loss to the additional $10,000 homestead exemption T2 = School district taxable value for M&O
